full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Category: General Service Among Government
The Department of National Defence invites eligible suppliers to submit an offer for the supply of an Enclosed Cargo Trailer and related items.

#### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01010035
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: November 2022
* **Curtailment Date**: December 7, 2022, at 14:00
* **Estimated Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Estimated Contract End Date**: N/A

#### Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide one (1) Enclosed Cargo Trailer in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR, Configuration 7. The requested delivery date for the goods is on or before 120 days after receipt of the order.

#### Solicitation Method
This tender is limited to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. Suppliers can register for a supply arrangement at [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).

#### Document Details
The tender documents may be submitted in either English or French. Interested suppliers can obtain more information from the government contact mentioned below.

#### Contact Information
Victor Shepstone
 Contracting Officer, DND
 Phone: 819-939-3040
 Email: victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
 Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Notice
This procurement is open to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) does not affect procurement and contract ordering terms for this procurement
This procurement includes delivery to the following regions:
* Canada
